traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Harshnag fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Weighted Net
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Gurt's Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (3d12 + 7 damage) slashing damage, or 39 (5d12 + 7 damage) slashing damage if the target is human.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.
